Authors: Gaol F.L., Kanigoro B., Salman A.G., Moniaga J.V., Chandra E., Chandra Z.R.
Title: Android based area web monitoring
Affiliations: Computer Science Program, School of Computer Science, Bina Nusantara University, Indonesia
Authors with affiliations: Gaol, F.L., Computer Science Program, School of Computer Science, Bina Nusantara University, Indonesia; Kanigoro, B., Computer Science Program, School of Computer Science, Bina Nusantara University, Indonesia; Salman, A.G., Computer Science Program, School of Computer Science, Bina Nusantara University, Indonesia; Moniaga, J.V., Computer Science Program, School of Computer Science, Bina Nusantara University, Indonesia; Chandra, E., Computer Science Program, School of Computer Science, Bina Nusantara University, Indonesia; Chandra, Z.R., Computer Science Program, School of Computer Science, Bina Nusantara University, Indonesia
Abstract: The research objective is to develop an application that can be used in the monitoring of an area by using a webcam. It aims to create a sense of security on the user's application because it can monitor an area using mobile phone anywhere. The results obtained in this study is to create an area with a webcam monitoring application that can be accessed anywhere as long as the monitoring results have internet access and can also be accessed through Android Based Mobile Phone. © Owned by the authors, published by EDP Sciences, 2014.
References: Logeswaran, R., Cost effective patient location monitoring system using webcams (2009) J. Med. Syst., 33 (5), pp. 399-407; Liu, C.H., Fan, C.C., The design of remote surveillance system for digital family (2009) Fifth International Conference on Intelligent Information Hiding and Multimedia Signal Processing, pp. 238-241; Li, J., Hao, W., De Luca, L.T., Research and design of embedded network video monitoring system based on linux (2008) International Conference on Computer Science and Software Engineering, 5, pp. 1310-1313; De Luca, L.T., (2009) Propulsion Physics, , EDP Sciences, Les Ulis; Yang, L., Jiang, L., Yue, K., Pang, H., International forum on information technology and applications (2010) Design and Implementation of the Lab Remote Monitoring System Based on Embedded Web Technology, pp. 172-175; Wong, W.K., Liew, T.Y., Loo, C.K., Wong, W.K., Omnidirectional surveillance system for digital home security (2009) International Conference on Signal Acquisition and Processing, pp. 8-12
Conference name: 2013 International Conference on Advances Science and Contemporary Engineering, ICASCE 2013
